about.title: About us
about.1: We are a young couple from Scotland and Japan and due to being so far apart we need to travel, a lot
about.2: ... and we have fallen in love with it. We both had a passion for photography beforehand.
about.3: But now being able to travel has allowed us to explore new places and culture's through our photography.
about.4: And this is something that we would love to share with everyone.
about.5: We are also available for freelance photography work for small businesses

blog.authorDesc: We are a young couple exploring the world through our photography and sharing it as we go

store.successMessage: Thank you so much for helping a young couple chase our photography dream. We hope you enjoy your print. You should receive a receipt via email shortly.
store.contactUs: If you have anything you want to ask us about or issues with your order please use the form below.

signup.title: Sign up to our monthly newsletter for updates, new products and articles
